Hey I am Bartosz

I am studying Computer Science. I like solving problems and constantly learning, so programming seems like perfect choice. However what led me to CS was Artificial Intelligence. More precisely Machine Learning. For me it is fascinating, that we could teach machine to solve human challenges. Is it for you? I think Deep Learning will have big impact on our future, even today we can observe big bloom in this industry.


Besides coding I like drinking coffee. Though it is not so simple as it looks like. Like wine coffee can vary in quality. I stive to drink specialty coffee. Specialty coffee is the best possible quality of this delicious drink. Why it is so important? Only this way one can dive into diverse sensational world of coffee with all smells and flavors. I like to be impressed by cup of my favorite beverage. Good cup of coffee allows me to jump into antoher verse for a while.
